title: Swim Diapers Size 3 (16-26 lbs), Huggies Little Swimmers Disposable Swimming Diapers, 36 Ct
description: Let your baby make a splash with Huggies Little Swimmers swim diapers! Huggies Little Swimmers water diapers are made with unique materials that won't swell in water like regular baby diapers and deliver a comfortable fit, wet or dry. The Double Leak Guards of these disposable swim diapers fit snugly around your baby's legs to help contain messes and offer secure protection in the water. These Huggies diapers for swimming are designed to fit like swimwear and feature easy open, refastenable sides for an adjustable fit and quick diaper changes, whether you're at the pool or on the beach. The soft, stretchy waistband also makes these baby swim pants comfortable for your baby. These swimming diapers are also made with no harsh ingredients and are free of fragrances, lotions, elemental chlorine bleaching and natural rubber latex. Each pack features two Disney·Pixar Finding Nemo designs your child will love. Perfect for the pool, beach, splash park and more! Huggies Little Swimmers are available in sizes 3 Small (16-26 lbs), 4 Medium (24-34 lbs) and 5-6 Large (32+ lbs).
